context: Evaluates correct usage of the agent-skills Jira skill to create a new issue. The solution must call create_issue or the equivalent CLI issue create subcommand with all required fields and correctly return the key of the new issue.

checklist.name: create_issue called
checklist.description: The solution calls create_issue with the project key, issue_type, and summary arguments, or invokes jira.py 'issue create' with the equivalent flags

checklist.name: New issue key returned
checklist.description: The key of the newly created issue (e.g. PROJECT-42) is extracted from the API response and displayed or returned to the caller

checklist.name: Optional fields passed
checklist.description: When description and priority are provided, they are forwarded as named arguments to create_issue and appear in the issue fields on retrieval

checklist.name: Rich text formatting
checklist.description: The description body is passed through format_rich_text before submission, producing ADF for Cloud or plain text for DataCenter/Server deployments
